title: Australian diary. No. 036
creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: The sculling skill of the Towns family are featured in this newsreel. Sydney holds an export packaging display, while apiarists move their bees to new blossoms. A memorial in Canberra honours the deeds of US Forces.
creator_credit_for_label: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
